author: Special Correspondent
text:
Rotary Club of Pondicherry Port is hosting a car rally themed ‘Adventures Pondicherry Treasure Hunt’ on Sunday.

Praveer Ranjan, IG, will flag off the rally at 8 a.m. from New Port, Colas Nagar. The rally will conclude at the Aroma Gardens in Edayanchavady, Auroville at around 1 p.m.

The event is sponsored by the Department of Tourism.
title: Treasure hunt tomorrow
